TopicTitle: Account wiped out somehow but I'm back....

Articles.Content: Well, I'm back on KSP. I seem to have lost my account and all my old posts on here in the April debacle. I haven't been back because my dad died Apr 25 and I had to take care of my mom for a couple of months. But I'm back now. I don't know if my old reputation can be restored -- it wasn't much but it was better than nothing. So hello again and happy flying. I'm currently working on better landers with stock parts. Just busted a wheel off on one as I landed on too much of a slope. Ah well, rescue time.....
